file.name: mollie.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0" info: title: "Mollie Shopware Plugin API" description: "This is a Swagger Template for all uses cases of the Mollie plugin.

Instructions:
  1. Configure the correct server domain, where your Shopware API ist available.
  2. Then use the authorize request for Shopware to retrieve an Access-Token. Use the default credentials or just enter your custom credentials.
  3. Just copy the Access-Token and use it in the global authorize section above the request list.

Congratulations, you can now use the API requests." servers: - url: / - url: https://localhost - url: http://localhost - url: '{custom}' variables: custom: default: https://localhost externalDocs: description: "Find out more about Mollie Shopware" url: "https://github.com/mollie/Shopware6/wiki" paths: /api/oauth/token: post: tags: - "Authorization" summary: "Shopware API Authorization" requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: grant_type: default: "password" client_id: default: "administration" scopes: default: "write" username: default: "admin" password: default: "shopware" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/search/order: post: tags: - "Shopware Order" summary: "Search for an order number" description: "Please insert your order number in the POST body." security: - AdminAPI: [] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: associations: type: object properties: transactions: type: object filter: type: array items: type: object properties: field: default: "orderNumber" type: default: "equals" value: default: "#OrderID#" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/order/{id}/transactions: get: tags: - "Shopware Order" summary: "See all transactions for the Shopware Order" description: "" security: - AdminAPI: [ ] parameters: - name: "id" in: "path" description: "Shopware Order ID" required: true responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/mollie/ship/order?number={number}: get: tags: - "Shipping (Operational)" summary: "Full shipment" security: - AdminAPI: [] parameters: - name: "number" in: "path" description: "Shopware order number" required: true responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/mollie/ship/item?order={order}&item={item}&quantity={quantity}: get: tags: - "Shipping (Operational)" summary: "Partial shipment" security: - AdminAPI: [] parameters: - name: "order" in: "path" description: "Shopware order number" required: true - name: "item" in: "path" description: "product number" - name: "quantity" in: "path" description: "quantity" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/mollie/refund/order?number={number}&description={description}: get: tags: - "Refunds (Operational)" summary: "Full Refund" security: - AdminAPI: [] parameters: - name: "number" in: "path" description: "Shopware order number" required: true - name: "description" in: "path" description: "(optional) custom description" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/mollie/refund/order?number={number}&amount={amount}&description={description}: get: tags: - "Refunds (Operational)" summary: "Partial Refund" security: - AdminAPI: [] parameters: - name: "number" in: "path" description: "Shopware order number" required: true - name: "amount" in: "path" description: "(optional) partial amount" - name: "description" in: "path" description: "(optional) custom description" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/_action/mollie/refund-manager/data: post: tags: - "Refunds (Technical)" summary: "Get data from Refund Manager" security: - AdminAPI: [] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: orderId: default: "" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/_action/mollie/refund: post: tags: - "Refunds (Technical)" summary: "Refund with Refund Manager" security: - AdminAPI: [] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: orderId: default: "" amount: default: "0.00" description: default: "" items: type: array items: type: object properties: id: default: "" amount: default: "0.0" quantity: default: "0" resetStock: default: "0" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" components: securitySchemes: AdminAPI: type: apiKey in: header name: Authorization

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /api/mollie/refund/order?number={number}&description={description}: get: parameters: parse parameter "number": parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
